com.psddev.dari.util
Class ImageEditor.Static

java.lang.Object
  com.psddev.dari.util.ImageEditor.Static
Enclosing interface:
ImageEditor
public static final class ImageEditor.Static
extends Object

Image editor utility methods.

The factory methods, getInstance(java.lang.String) and getDefault(), use settings to construct instances.

For the image editing functions, such as crop(java.lang.String, com.psddev.dari.util.StorageItem, java.util.Map, java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Integer) and resize(java.lang.String, com.psddev.dari.util.StorageItem, java.util.Map, java.lang.Integer, java.lang.Integer), the editorName parameter may be null to use the default image editor.

Method Summary
static StorageItem crop(ImageEditor editor, StorageItem image, Map<String,Object> options, Integer x, Integer y, Integer width, Integer height)
          Crops the given image from the given x and y by the given width and height using the given editor.

          Deprecated. Use crop(ImageEditor, StorageItem, Map, Integer, Integer, Integer, Integer) instead.

          Resizes the given image by the given width and height using the given editor.
static StorageItem resize(String editorName, StorageItem image, Map<String,Object> options, Integer width, Integer height)
          Deprecated. Use resize(ImageEditor, StorageItem, Map, Integer, Integer) instead.
